channel.title: PLEASE answer this question
channel.description:
well because i'm used to the old school server i realy don't know anything about these 508 so i went off to experiment a litle bit... but my question is how do you run see in each tutorial they just say run and compile... but what the hell so when i open my server folder i see three files... and one of them is filled with batch files i think i got to use one of them but which one
i understad you like to call me noob or what ever because i asked this question please don't waste your time on flaming cursing cussing or what ever
thank you

item.title: PLEASE answer this question
item.dc:creator: @disciple disciple
item.description:
@disciple wrote:

easy. There are probably 3 folders like this: src,cmd,and bin. Simply go to cmd(the 1 with batchfiles in it) Edit the batch that says “run” file to your java update. When u click run a cmd prompt screen will come up and most likely say : “Starting server on port 43594…” Then once that is done, go to your 508 client, edit client .java (if u haven’t already) and scroll all the way down. You should see an ip somewhere. Change that to 127.0.0.1, then save exit. hit “build” and compile your client. Hit run and there you go =)

Read full topic
